CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 18, 1961, pg. 6, reads: "Distinguished Service Badges - Three of the nine Pittsburgh policemen, who won citations at a Citizens Law Enforcement Assistance Network, honoring 24 awardees from Western Pennsylvania are shown, as Mayor Joseph M. Barr, far left, presents citation and gold badge to Patrolman Mason, center, at a banquet in Hotel Penn-Sheraton Sunday. Winners of similar awards at the same affair, looking on, are: Patrolmen Angelo T. Takos, left, and James E. Casson in right background. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Police Officers Angelo T. Takos, Oliver Mason receiving plaque from Mayor Joseph M. Barr, and Police Officer James E. Casson, in Penn Sheraton Hotel
